This is welcome news among many recent announcements deepening the US-UK alliance. Our British allies play a critical role in our Five Eyes alliance & tech from #Huawei, which is integral to the Chinese Communist Party’s global espionage operation, endangers our mutual security. https://twitter.com/NBCNews/status/1283009922750242817 QT @NBCNews JUST IN: UK announces that China's Huawei will be banned from its high-speed 5G telecommunications network and the company's existing infrastructure will be removed by 2027. https://nbcnews.trib.al/4Eglx6E

Senator Rubio joins @AmericaNewsroom to talk #China, #coronavirus and more.

Very glad to see our closest ally move to secure their telecommunications networks. 

I urge our friends in the U.K. should ban Chinese state-directed #Huawei from their 5g network without delay.

This is big news—and I applaud our British allies for reversing their decision. Huawei is a lackey of the Chinese Communist Party and should play no role within the critical infrastructure of the U.S. or our allies. https://twitter.com/BBCBreaking/status/1283005301508255745 QT @BBCBreaking UK mobile providers must remove all Huawei’s 5G kit from their networks by 2027, government announces https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/technology-53403793

Rejecting these illegitimate claims by #China’s Communist Party is a very important step towards demonstrating our commitment to international law & a free & open Indo-Pacific. 

We should follow up by passing my  bipartisan South China Sea & East China Sea Sanctions Act. https://twitter.com/secpompeo/status/1282744325076660227 QT @SecPompeo We are strengthening U.S. policy on South China Sea maritime claims, according to international law, in rejection of Beijing’s intimidation, bullying, and claims of maritime empire.

In the great state of Texas, we support entrepreneurs, innovation, and jobs. Lifting up in prayer the Rositas family & the #RGV BP community during this difficult time. https://twitter.com/USBPChiefRGV/status/1282390886652010497 QT @USBPChiefRGV McAllen Station Border Patrol Agent Enrique J. Rositas passed away on July 11, 2020 after a courageous battle with COVID-19.  Agent Rositas proudly served the United States Border Patrol for nearly 23 years. Our deepest condolences, thoughts and prayers are with his family,

RT @BWestbrookAZ8 Kudos to the climate task force co-chaired by @AOC for creating this plan. It’s not perfect, but it’s 10x better than Joe’s previous policy.
